chapters.title: Chapter 18: News for the Dragon
chapters.info: Lord Algarin Pendaloan, p. 384—Lesser Lord of the Land in Tear. He has a wrinkly face and a white beard. He provided accomodations for Rand, Min, Verin, Cadsuane, Lan, Nynaeve, and the rest of their group on his manor so they could recuperate from the events at Shadar Logoth. His younger brother Emarin could channel, and Algarin wants to be tested for the ability now as well. While he is away at the Black Tower, Rand is using his estates in Tear to lay low for a while.
